work_context.current_task: T045: Implement real-time analysis progress tracking component
work_context.notes: Created analysis-progress component with real-time polling (5s intervals), phase-by-phase progress display, subtask tracking, error/warning handling, and estimated completion time. Increased Angular component style budget to 10KB to accommodate comprehensive Material Design styling.

Review modified files listed in this checkpoint

project_goals: Demonstrate migration workflows from monoliths to microservices
Provide intelligent automation through agentic systems
Establish best practices for microservices decomposition
Enable practical implementation with real-world tools
